properties.name: Dehoo manganese deposit, Dehoo, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Dehoo manganese deposit, Dehoo, Zahedan County, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, Iran

Location: Iran

A predominantly submarine hydrothermal Mn deposit complemented by terrigenous detrital mafic material. Situated in the central part of the Iranian Flysch Zone. Located 52 km to the south-southwest of Zahedan and 7 km to the southeast of Dehoo.

View on Mindat.org
